properties.entry: SELECT ORDER_NO , ORDER_DATE , AMOUNT , TRAVEL_DATE , MEM_NAME , TRAVEL_EMAIL , O.STATUS , C_REASON , MEM_NO , P_NAME FROM TORDER O JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEM_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P USING (P_CODE)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT ORDER_NO , ORDER_DATE , AMOUNT , TRAVEL_DATE , MEM_NAME , TRAVEL_EMAIL , O.STATUS , C_REASON , MEM_NO , P_NAME FROM TORDER O JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEM_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P USING (P_CODE) )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO TORDER ( ORDER_NO , AMOUNT , TRAVEL_DATE , TRAVEL_USER , TRAVEL_EMAIL , MEM_NO , P_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_ONO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
